p.codeblock: public abstract int enableEchoCancellationExternal(boolean enabled, int audioSourceDelay);
virtual int enableEchoCancellationExternal(bool enabled, int audioSourceDelay) = 0;
public abstract int EnableEchoCancellationExternal(bool enabled, int audioSourceDelay);
Future<void> enableEchoCancellationExternal( {required bool enabled, required int audioSourceDelay});

section.p: After calling this method, you can push external audio frames to the custom audio module for echo cancellation.
section.note: You need to call this method after calling , but before joining the channel.

plentry.pd:
Set whether to enable custom echo cancellation:
: Enable custom echo cancellation.
: Disable custom echo cancellation.

Sets the time (in milliseconds) between pushing audio frames and publishing audio frames. The value range is [0, 100].
To call , make sure this parameter is set to 0.
To call or process the audio frame captured by the sound card, please make sure that this parameter is an integer multiple of 10.
